name: Hi, Little Ghost! (demo)
description:
Main keys -

z - you can approach any object and press the z button. So you can see or read about the subject.

the controls in the levels are written.

"Hello Little Ghost!" - A psychological thriller with many mysteries for the player to solve. You will never solve this mystery without moving your convolutions.

Attention! This is a demo version of the game. Full version in development.

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5+ engine.
